DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy acetylcysteine compare placebo contrast-induced nephropathy prevention , 48 96 hour procedure use contrast . Contrast-induced nephropathy define increase 25 % serum creatinine procedure .
DOC.criteria: At least one follow criterion : Aged 70 yearsold Chronic renal failure ( define serum creatinine high 1.5mg/dL within last 3 month ) Diabetes mellitus Congestive heart failure ventricular disfunction ( left ventricular ejection fraction le 0.45 ) Shock intraaortic balloon pump use Urgency emergency procedure Pregnant woman , breastfeed age 45 yearsold efficacious contraceptive method . Patients dialysis Previous inclusion trial Patient refusal inform consent Pacientes com Infarto Agudo Miocárdio com supradesnivelamento segmento ST no quais não seja possível administrar protocolo de hidratação pré e pósprocedimento .
